short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get daily inspiration with uplifting wellness quotes. Boost your day with positivity and mindfulness every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wellness Quotes is a Chrome extension that brings positivity to your day. Each time you open a new tab, you'll see motivational quotes focused on wellness, self-care, and personal growth. Stay inspired and focused on well-being, no matter what you're doing.

ðŸ‘‰ Key Features of Wellness Quotes:

â–º Daily Quotes: Get a fresh quote every time you open a new tab, helping to boost your mood and keep you motivated throughout the day.

â–º Simple and Elegant Design: The extension features a clean and minimalistic interface, providing an unobtrusive experience while delivering thoughtful quotes.

â–º Offline Support: Quotes are available even when you're offline, ensuring you have access to inspiration at any time.

â–º Lightweight and Fast: The extension is designed to be lightweight, loading quickly without slowing down your browsing experience.

â–º No Distractions: Focus on the positivity without unnecessary ads or clutterâ€”just pure, daily inspiration.

One cool thing is that this Wellness Quotes Extension is free, and you don't need to log in or sign up to use the services. (Installing or uninstalling this extension may display promotional content.)
